entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who spoke first in the scene. He said 'Unfortunately, I had to hex Kingsley too...' indicating that he was involved in the events leading up to this point.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as getting up and dragging Harry and Marietta with her. This shows that she is taking action in response to Dumbledore's words.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is being dragged by Professor McGonagall, indicating that he was involved in the events leading up to this point.

entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is also being dragged by Professor McGonagall, showing that she was present at the scene.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as one of the people who lay motionless on the floor. This shows that he was affected by Dumbledore's actions.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is also mentioned as being among those who were affected by Dumbledore's actions.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as someone who was hexed by Dumbledore. This shows that he played a role in the events leading up to this point.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is described as soaring above the scene, singing softly. This shows that he was present and observing the events.

entities.name: minerva
entities.description: Minerva is mentioned as someone who should be thanked by McGonagall for Kingsley's actions.

entities.name: edgecombe
entities.description: Miss Edgecombe is mentioned as having her memory modified by Kingsley. This shows that she was involved in the events leading up to this point.

entities.name: office
entities.description: The office is described as being wrecked, with Dumbledore's desk overturned and tables knocked over.

relationships.description: Dumbledore hexed Kingsley, indicating that he was taking action against him.
Professor McGonagall dragged Harry with her, showing that she was taking care of him in response to Dumbledore's words.
Professor McGonagall also dragged Marietta with her, indicating that she was taking care of both Harry and Marietta.
Dumbledore mentioned that Kingsley modified Miss Edgecombe's memory, showing that he was aware of the events leading up to this point.
Professor McGonagall was asked by Dumbledore to thank Minerva for Kingsley's actions, indicating that there is a connection between them.
